SELECT *, if(liked_article_ids.liked_article_id, 1, 0) AS done FROM articles
LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, name, avatar FROM users) AS users ON articles.user_id = users.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes GROUP BY article_id) AS likes ON articles.id = likes.article_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM comments GROUP BY article_id) AS comments ON articles.id = comments.article_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT article_id AS liked_article_id FROM likes WHERE user_id = #{id}) AS liked_article_ids ON articles.id = liked_article_ids.liked_article_id
WHERE status = 0
ORDER BY articles.created_at DESC
